products.title: Wireless Headphones
products.descr: Experience crystal-clear audio with our wireless headphones featuring advanced noise cancellation, up to 30 hours of battery life, and comfortable ear cushions for all-day listening.

products.title: Headphones
products.descr: Experience crystal-clear audio with our wireless headphones featuring advanced noise cancellation, up to 30 hours of battery life, and comfortable ear cushions for all-day listening.

products.title: Gaming Mouse
products.descr: Designed for gamers, this mouse features ultra-responsive buttons, customizable DPI up to 16,000, RGB lighting, and an ergonomic grip that reduces fatigue during long gaming sessions.

products.title: Office Chair
products.descr: Our ergonomic office chair offers premium lumbar support, a breathable mesh back, padded armrests, and smooth-rolling casters for maximum comfort and mobility during work hours.

products.title: Running Shoes
products.descr: These lightweight running shoes are engineered with shock-absorbing soles, a breathable upper mesh, and enhanced heel support to provide superior comfort and performance on every run.

products.title: Water Bottle
products.descr: Made of durable stainless steel, this insulated water bottle keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours and hot for up to 12, with a leak-proof cap and sweat-free finish.

products.title: Bluetooth Speaker
products.descr: Enjoy powerful sound anywhere with our portable Bluetooth speaker, featuring IPX7 waterproofing, 12-hour playtime, and deep bass for a truly immersive audio experience.

products.title: Yoga Mat
products.descr: This non-slip yoga mat is made with eco-friendly materials, offering 6mm of cushion and grip for stability during yoga, Pilates, and fitness exercises at home or the gym.

products.title: LED Desk Lamp
products.descr: A modern LED desk lamp with 3 brightness levels, USB charging port, touch control, and an adjustable neck—perfect for studying, reading, or working late into the night.

products.title: Wireless Charger
products.descr: Charge your phone effortlessly with this fast wireless charger pad. It's compatible with all Qi-enabled devices and comes with overheat and overcharge protection for safety.

products.title: Notebook Set
products.descr: This pack of 3 premium softcover notebooks features 120 dotted pages each, perfect for journaling, bullet planning, sketching, and organizing your thoughts or to-do lists.

products.title: Sunglasses
products.descr: Stylish and functional, these polarized sunglasses offer 100% UV protection, lightweight frames, and anti-glare lenses—ideal for driving, outdoor activities, and beachwear.
